item.title: Introduction
item.description:
very cool blog http://localhost:1313/introduction/ -

Hello, my name is Edvard Tome, which you can probably tell by this site url. I’m a computer science student studying in DCU and I absolutely love my life. This is my first ever personal blog page, so it might look a bit messy but it functions. Will be uploading a mix of general life updates and grind stuff. (You can look at what tags i’ve uploaded to by clicking/pressing on the menu at the top left.)

aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa

- http://localhost:1313/introduction/ -
